onboarding4.authyourkeys.subtext: Onboarding with Obi creates a multi-key login to keep your account secure and recoverable without needing seed phrases.

onboarding5.setsocialkey.subtext: Enter or scan the juno address of a trusted friend who can help you recover your account. Your friend cannot access your account.
onboarding5.setsocialkey.subtext2: …or you can use the default Obi account if you don't trust any of your friends. Obi cannot access your account.
